name: Room Service
description: Room service allows guests to order food, beverages, or other amenities directly to their rooms for convenience and privacy.

name: Housekeeping
description: Housekeeping services include cleaning and maintaining guest rooms, changing linens, and ensuring a comfortable and tidy environment.

name: Wi-Fi and Internet Access
description: hotel provide complimentary Wi-Fi and internet access to guests, enabling them to stay connected during their stay.

name: Concierge
description: The concierge assists guests with various tasks, such as booking reservations, arranging transportation, and providing information about local attractions.

name: Fitness Center
description: Hotels often have on-site fitness centers equipped with exercise machines and sometimes offer fitness classes or personal training sessions.

name: Swimming Pool
description: A swimming pool provides guests with a recreational option, allowing them to relax and unwind during their stay.

name: Conference and Event Facilities
description: For business travelers or event organizers, hotels may have meeting rooms and banquet halls equipped for conferences, seminars, or social events.

name: 24-Hour Security
description: Hotels prioritize guest safety with 24-hour security measures, including surveillance, key card access, and trained staff.

name: Front Desk/Reception
description: The front desk is the central hub of the hotel, where guests check-in, check-out, and get information about hotel services.
